response.overview: Set in the 22nd century, when a battered salvage ship sends out a distress signal, the seasoned crew of the rescue hospital ship Nova-17 responds. What they find is a black hole--that threatens to destroy both ships--and a mysterious survivor whose body quickly mutates into a monstrous and deadly form.
response.tagline: All hell is about to break loose.
response.title: Supernova

results.name: Supernova (2000) Robert Forster Remembers Intense Makeup and Prosthetics HD
